description: A mean reversion trading strategy backtest using Bollinger Bands. Buys when price touches lower band (oversold) and sells when price touches upper band (overbought).

period.description: Number of periods for the moving average calculation (e.g., 20)

multiplier.description: Standard deviation multiplier for Bollinger Bands (e.g., 2.0)

sl.description: Stop loss percentage as decimal (e.g., 0.02 for 2%)

tp.description: Take profit percentage as decimal (e.g., 0.04 for 4%)
